description: Research tree priorities and strategy guide by player profile

overview.fc_research: Furnace Level 30 (Fire Crystal research for advanced units)
overview.critical_milestone: Tool Enhancement VII - reduces all research time significantly

key_technologies.name: Tool Enhancement
key_technologies.reason: Speeds up ALL research - must max first

economy.notes: Lower priority than Growth for most players

battle.notes: Best for Power gains and SvS performance

tool_enhancement_priority.description: Tool Enhancement is THE most important research in the game
why_critical: Every research after Tool Enhancement VII is 35% faster
Time saved compounds - earlier VII = more total time saved
Affects ALL future research including Battle tree
Most efficient use of early-game speedups
tool_enhancement_priority.common_mistake: Spreading research across trees before maxing Tool Enhancement VII

priority_order.reason: MUST reach VII before anything else

mid_game.milestone: Tool Enhancement VII is THE mid-game milestone
mid_game.total_focus: Growth tree 60%, Battle tree 30%, Economy tree 10%

late_game.total_focus: Battle tree 60%, Growth tree 30%, Economy tree 10%

f2p.overall_strategy: Maximize Tool Enhancement VII ASAP, then balanced approach
research_order: 1. Tool Enhancement VII (use ALL speedups here)
f2p.speedup_usage: Hoard speedups for Tool Enhancement research only until VII
avoid: Deep Battle tree before Tool Enhancement VII
f2p.reasoning: F2P players are time-constrained. Tool Enhancement VII reduces all future time by 35%.

minnow.overall_strategy: Tool Enhancement VII priority, then Battle focus
minnow.speedup_usage: Spend on Tool Enhancement and key Battle research
minnow.reasoning: With some speedups from packs, can afford more Battle focus after VII

dolphin.overall_strategy: Faster Tool Enhancement VII, aggressive Battle tree
dolphin.reasoning: Speedups allow faster progression - Battle gives power for SvS

whale.reasoning: Speedups aren't a constraint - complete everything

svs_combat.emphasis: Battle tree > Growth tree > Economy tree
key_techs: Infantry/Marksman/Lancer Attack (prioritize your main troop type)
svs_combat.reasoning: Battle research directly improves combat performance

balanced_growth.emphasis: Growth tree > Battle tree > Economy tree

economy_focus.emphasis: Growth tree > Economy tree > Battle tree
economy_focus.reasoning: More resources enable more upgrades over time
economy_focus.caveat: Still do Tool Enhancement VII first - it affects Economy research too

rally_lead.emphasis: Battle tree priority, especially attack stats
key_techs: Max attack for your primary troop type
rally_lead.reasoning: Rally lead stats affect the entire rally

filler.reasoning: Your individual stats matter less - focus on troop count

farmer.emphasis: Economy tree higher priority than usual

common_mistakes.why_bad: Economy research has lowest combat value and doesn't speed up progression
common_mistakes.fix: Do Economy tree last, after Growth and Battle

common_mistakes.mistake: Spreading research across all trees before Tool Enhancement VII
common_mistakes.why_bad: Every research takes 35% longer than it would after VII
common_mistakes.fix: Focus Growth tree until Tool Enhancement VII, then branch out

common_mistakes.why_bad: Speedups are precious - using them inefficiently wastes value
common_mistakes.fix: Hoard speedups for Tool Enhancement (and later, key Battle research)

common_mistakes.mistake: Ignoring Battle tree after Tool Enhancement VII
common_mistakes.why_bad: Battle research gives significant Power and combat stats
common_mistakes.fix: Switch focus to Battle tree after VII for SvS preparation

common_mistakes.why_bad: Attack wins fights - defense just reduces losses

research_speed_calculation.example: A 100-day research with Tool Enhancement VII takes 65 days
